ðŸ“– Summary: Dioxus is a Rust framework for building cross-platform applications. It enables developers to write code once and deploy it to web, desktop, and mobile platforms. Key features include ergonomic state management, type-safe routing, server functions, an integrated bundler, and instant hot-reloading for rapid development.
